option-a.comment: Too import-centric. Doesn't reflect that browsing is the primary activity.

option-b.comment: Import controls taking permanent space on the primary surface doesn't match usage â€” import is monthly, browsing is daily.

option-c.comment: Catalog as home base is right. Import is one of many future actions (Beatport, SoundCloud, local MP3, AI generation) that feed into the catalog. Sheet/drawer pattern extensible for multiple source types.

overall: DJs browse far more than they import. Catalog IS the product. Import is tactical and infrequent. AI setlist generation is a different mode (exploratory, not import). Need extensible pattern for multiple sources. C is the right foundation.
